entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Rain mixed with light snow late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
